des: "So good even the carnivores love theses baked barbeque bean curd sticks."
ins:
Soak bean curd sticks in cold water until softened, about 1 hour; drain. Cut into 4-inch sticks.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix nutritional yeast, peanut butter, miso paste, melted margarine, and paprika together in a mixing bowl. Brush on each side of bean curd sticks. Arrange on a rimmed baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until heated through, 20 to 30 minutes. Brush with barbeque sauce. Continue baking 15 minutes more.
